title: OnePlus Digital WellPaper app offers new look, adds three new wallpapers
content:
Last year, OnePlus announced through its innovation hub, OneLab, the release of a new digital wellbeing app for Android smartphones. What made the Digital WellPaper app unique was that it made Android users subtly aware of their activities like screen time and smartphone usage by creatively displaying it as an element on an organic live wallpaper. It

The post OnePlus Digital WellPaper app offers new look, adds three new wallpapers appeared first on XDA.
description: OnePlus has updated its digital wellbeing app, WellPaper. The app arrives in the 2022 with a new look and three new wallpapers.
